channel.title: The general sentiment of Runescape players
channel.description:
So I was on youtube, and yeah. Zarfot, one of the top players, has a channel and has made quite a few parody videos. I found them hilarious because they capture the attitudes of some groups of players perfectly, so I figured I'd share.
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=V92p6uy9VK4
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0tklz_TuyzU
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=O9YjqK8cYd0
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Fdtlq8JP15o
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vIDrJq_zVpY
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Xj_NVDQ_c0s
This one is funny too, imo: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=alR-EtNNBco (but only because it's having the biggest dig at someone ever).
They're all parody videos mocking the people that complain every time the game is modified in some way.

item.title: The general sentiment of Runescape players
item.dc:creator: @bloodrayne bloodrayne
item.description:
@bloodrayne wrote:

That’s pretty funny stuff. I always assumed the top players were anti social etc, this guy’s pretty cool lol.

Read full topic
item.source: The general sentiment of Runescape players

item.title: The general sentiment of Runescape players
item.dc:creator: @Uriko Uriko
item.description:
@Uriko wrote:

[quote=“Lothy, post:10, topic:296293”][quote author=ZeroFreeze link=topic=392312.msg2922819#msg2922819 date=1250856072]
That Microsoft Sam voice thing ruined it; I found the videos be horribly annoying.
[/quote]
That voice is a big part of what makes it valuable though. It’s annoying, just like the players that act like this… and it just drones on and on in a monotonous way, again imitating the players that it seeks to make fun of. :P[/quote]it still made it unbearable to watch. lol.

Read full topic
item.source: The general sentiment of Runescape players

item.title: The general sentiment of Runescape players
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

ZeroFreeze:

That Microsoft Sam voice thing ruined it; I found the videos be horribly annoying.

That voice is a big part of what makes it valuable though. It’s annoying, just like the players that act like this… and it just drones on and on in a monotonous way, again imitating the players that it seeks to make fun of.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

the bank:

I can’t understand!!!

Haha. The inefficient use of the english language is part of the parody. Thank god I don’t actually read much on the RS forums.
